Text.val: The Main Data Source is set in the first line of the Data View tab, just after the words "Main Source".
Here you can see that it is set to the "Generic Test Table".
The initial Index is also set. Here it is set to Index: 4.
Any Column lines that are selected will be selected from the Main table, unless they are located
within a Link block. Here you can see four Columns from the Generic Test Table.

ExpSyntax.val: 'DV02: How Do I Determine a Task’s Main Data Source?'

Text.val: This task writes to two text BLOBS, then reads them into a memory table.
This reads in the blob, using a ':' as a delimiter
